function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling confirmed COVID-19 cases in the workplace","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 among co-workers and close contacts","Mitigation":"Immediate isolation, testing, and evacuation of infected workers; Close contact tracing and quarantine procedures","Technologies":"NAAT testing, N95 masks, telephones, CCTV footage","People":"Workers, confirmed caseworkers, co-workers, close contacts","Owner":"Companies, relevant functions/departments"}]}
